text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to advise the client to file an IP complaint directly with Google Ads/Bing to restrict the competitor's use of the trademark in search ad text. The candidate answer provides a comprehensive guide covering evidence gathering, legal claims (trademark, passing off, copyright), pre-action steps (solicitor instruction, cease and desist letter), and ADR methods. However, it does not explicitly advise the client to file an IP complaint directly with Google Ads/Bing regarding search ad text, although it mentions capturing evidence of Google Ads use under Section 1.2.", "criterion_id": "55271547-ef78-4d48-a0fc-2b762550eab4"}
